Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 4/20/1990
Subject: Mackey Sasser injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Pulled Hamstring Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Andy Stankiewicz
Dear Sir,
Andy Stankiewicz has an AVG of .320 at A Jupiter Hammerheads!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Rey Sanchez
Dear Sir,
Rey Sanchez isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .227, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
